msg: Fixed the problem with libtool by just removing -lapr dep

msg: list.mk contains list of modules to be built,
Like this we could build jk2 for Apache 1.3 with/without APR

author: hgomez
msg: We could now build mod_jk2 for Apache 1.3 and 2.0 at the
same time, configure and build static apr for apache 1.3
and generate api doc via scandoc
